name: Code Review Preproject Agent
shortDescription: Validates presence of the pre-project planning file and routes if missing.
fullDescription: This agent verifies whether the required 'preplanejamento.md' file is present in the specified directory. If the file is not found, it redirects the user to the appropriate pre-project code generation agent using a handoff.
UseCases:
- Ensure project planning documentation is complete before code generation.
- Automatically route users to generate missing planning files.
- Enforce pre-coding validation workflows.
